clip_title: Did you just refer to me as white devil This how they know you
transcript:
Ace:
[Ouda is translating to the Wachootoo]
Did you just refer to me as "White Devil"? 
Ouda:
This how they know you. 
Ace:
Leave that part out from now on. | Did you just refer to me as white devil This how they know you Leave that part out from now on
subtitles: {"1":{"TimeStart":1,"TimeEnd":4.672,"Text":"Did you just refer to me as white devil This how they know you"},"2":{"TimeStart":4.772,"TimeEnd":6.94,"Text":"Leave that part out from now on"}}
movie_plot: Ace Ventura, Pet Detective, returns from a spiritual quest to investigate the disappearance of a rare white bat, the sacred animal of a tribe in Africa.
